channel.title: Mod, Admin and Owner Cape
channel.description:
First things first, thanks to Lolsant for requesting these.
Anyway, there are 3 capes, Mod is light blue, admin is gold and owner is red. They each have wings, a crown and a skull on the back.
[IMG]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/4474/3capes.png[/img]
Criticism is encouraged! (and welcomed!)
Download link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?nmmwm0wk4kc]Here![/url]
Thanks, James
(P.S. I am a leecher. Don't expect me to post my work here unless I run it past someone like ACF first. Yes, i fused bits together. Goodbye.)

item.title: Mod, Admin and Owner Cape
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

[quote=“gary1998”]tbh, who actualy gives a shit if he leeched it or not =/, all this talk about “you leeched this you leeched that your a leecher” is to be plain fucking annoying! its on like 90 percent of the model posts, regardless of weather he leeched or made it himself, ppl will still use it =/ all of the good model makers here have to relise is ppl have to start somewhere, which is what he is doin tbh.

anywhoo nice model ama use em

gary[/quote]
You’re wrong. we tell beginning modellers to make their models from scratch because if we didn’t they would never get advanced with programs such as Metasequoia.
They would just get a JaGeX Limited model and recolour/remake it.
Which is Illegal and against the forum rules( not if you creditted the respectfull maker of this model, which he didn’t.).
So he is doing stuff against the rules anyway, we do give a “shit” because we actually care about the members of this site.
Don’t tell me that it is annoying, it’s the best we can say to them.

-ACF

Read full topic

item.title: Mod, Admin and Owner Cape
item.dc:creator: @gary1988 gary1988
item.description:
@gary1988 wrote:

[quote=“Assassins Creed Fan, post:12, topic:267632”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=353324.msg2709494#msg2709494 date=1237223206]
I think you’ll find that i got 2 obsidian capes and put it so it surrounds the player, i added in a crown that i cut in half. I also spent the time to find the skull, which i also changed. I made it fit on the RS player, and checked that it doesn’t overlap anything.

I think you’ll find that everything on this forum is:

© CopyRighted JaGeX Limited

[/quote]Don’t quite think so, modellers who make models THEMSELF their models aren’t © CopyRighted of JaGeX Limited.
They are © CopyRighted with their own name.
You have allot to learn and i suggest to explore with modelling programs like Metasequoia etc.
Don’t leech a model, make one from SCRATCH[/quote]

tbh, who actualy gives a shit if he leeched it or not =/, all this talk about “you leeched this you leeched that your a leecher” is to be plain fucking annoying! its on like 90 percent of the model posts, regardless of weather he leeched or made it himself, ppl will still use it =/ all of the good model makers here have to relise is ppl have to start somewhere, which is what he is doin tbh.

anywhoo nice model ama use em

gary

Read full topic

item.title: Mod, Admin and Owner Cape
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

This isn’t his work, he just put 2 normal capes in the model ( © CopyRighted JaGeX Limited)
And angel wings ( not his work either.)
he just added the skull and the crown…

What he said on msn:

I'm goin' out blastin, takin' my enemies with me and if not, they scarred, so they will never forget me. says: Fused some together, made some bits myself.
Otherwise said, he's a [b]leecher[/b] of already made models.

Read full topic
